training.capstone.pharma

Interface PatientService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PatientServiceImpl

    public interface PatientService
    The PatientService interface defines the contract for managing patient and user data and operations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Add a new patient to the system.
      UserEO addUser(UserEO user)
      Add a new user to the system.

      Get a list of all patients in the system.

      Find a patient by their email address.
      OrderEO findOrderById(int orderId)
      Find an order by its order ID.

      Find a patient by their ID and include their orders.

      Get the last order ID associated with a patient.
      java.lang.Boolean IsUser(java.lang.String email)
      Check if a user with the given email address already exists.
      void updateOrderStatus(java.lang.String patientId, int orderId, java.lang.String newStatus)
      Update the status of an order for a specific patient.

        Returns:

      • IsUser

        java.lang.Boolean IsUser(java.lang.String email)
        Check if a user with the given email address already exists.
        Parameters:
        email - The email address to check.
        Returns:
        True if the user exists, false otherwise.

      • findPatientWithOrdersById

        Find a patient by their ID and include their orders.
        Parameters:
        patientId - The ID of the patient to find.
        Returns:
        The patient with orders included.

      • getLastOrderid

        int getLastOrderid(java.lang.String patientId)
        Get the last order ID associated with a patient.
        Parameters:
        patientId - The ID of the patient to find the last order ID for.
        Returns:
        The last order ID for the patient.

      • updateOrderStatus

        void updateOrderStatus(java.lang.String patientId,
                       int orderId,
                       java.lang.String newStatus)
        Update the status of an order for a specific patient.
        Parameters:
        patientId - The ID of the patient.
        orderId - The ID of the order to update.
        newStatus - The new status for the order.
